task11_key2: Iss task mein humein ek aur chota sa anlysis run karna hai. Ab hum movies ko by genre analyse karenge.
task11_key3: Yahan dekho ki Anand ka Genre mein **Drama** likha hua hai. Bahot saari movies ke ek se zyada genres bhi hote hain.
task11_key4: Ek `analyse_movies_genre` naam ka function likho. Yeh function ek `movies_list` naam ka parameter lega jisme mein woh list hogi jo `get_movie_list_details` wala function return karta hai. Matlab `movies_list` ka structure aisa hoga:
task11_key5: Aapke function ko ek dictionary return karni hai jismein har genre ka naam `keys` mein hoga aur genre ki number of movies uski value mein hoga.
task11_key6: **Note: Yeh `keys` aur values ko kaise refer kara hai ispe khaas dhyaan di jiye. Issi tareeke se dictionaries ki baat karte hain :)**
task11_key7: `analyse_movies_genre` wali return value ki dictionary ka neeche dia hua structure dia hua hai.
task11_key8: Yeh function aapko saari 250 movies pe run karna hai.
task11_key10: Ab kya hint ki zaroorat hai? Bahot baar kar lia aapne yeh :)
